There was tragedy on Lake Albert when 92 refugees from DR Congo were packed in a boat that capsized presumably on account of overloading.
So far 41 people have been rescued alive but unfortunately 19 bodies have been recovered. The rescue mission has had to be suspended.
This is because the lake is too rough to allow further rescue mission. 32 people are, therefore, still missing.
Gvt sends its deepest condolences to the bereaved families and assures that rescue mission will resume as soon as the weather permits.
@UrbanTVUganda @paulwebs1 WHAAAT!,
@keithduncanm at the time I got the last update, the water was too rough for the rescue 2 continue. It'll be resumed asa the weather permits

Over the weekend our forces struck at a terrorist who organized & planned attacks on innocent Israelis.
Our policy is to attack those who attack us and who are planning to attack us. Both were applicable in this case.
We also discovered a Hamas attack tunnel. These items underscore the importance of strict security procedures in any future settlement

Soon all the ministries must submit their action plans for #Crimea, each bearing full responsibility for the issues within its competence
A special commission on #Crimea is being established by @GovernmentRF, to be headed by Deputy Prime Minister Dmitry Kozak
We need to adapt #Crimea's government to Russian standards as soon as possible, without compromising the quality of the work
The immigration authorities will finish issuing Russian passports to Crimean residents who wish to obtain one by this summer
Stronger intl coop essential to foster a nuclear security culture across globe & to protect our citizens - #NSS2014 http://t.co/baWQza3OES
The Russian rouble is already the official currency in #Crimea. The hryvnia will still be in circulation until the end of 2015
The best possible route across the Kerch Strait must be worked out by the end of the year #Crimea
Rostelecom must be established in #Crimea as soon as possible. Foreign companies handling important messages is unacceptable
